name: Transition to adulthood
description:
The main character Jess is sent by her friends to the resort town in Canada to celebrate the end of high school. They'd found an old beachfront holiday house
for rent.
Jess recently broke up with her boyfriend and is looking for a new hot relationship.

You will get acquainted with 9 characters of the novel. The story line will tell you about a get-together at the campfire on the beach, an adult game of spin-bottle, a yacht trip to the island and a loud disco.Features
  • Visual Novel game with Sexy Content.
  • A cute and fun well written story-line.
  • 1080p window & Full Screen Options.
  • Steam achievements
